de.sengerts.tictactoe.model.players

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sengerts.tictactoe.model.players.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a player of a tic tac toe game.
    Author:
    Tobias Senger

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(GameLogic gameLogic,
              PlayerSign playerSign)
        Another constructor for class Player. Creates a new object of type Player with the given tic tac toe game and player sign.
        Parameters:
        gameLogic - the game logic of the game this player is associated with
        playerSign - the sign of this player
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given player sign is null

    • Method Detail

      • makeMove

        public abstract void makeMove()
        Abstract method for the make move logic in a tic tac toe game. Here, the player picks a field which should be marked. After that the tic tac toe game this player is associated with checks whether there now is a draw or winner and decides what to do next. This method is implemented by subclasses of this parent class.

      • isAIPlayer

        public abstract boolean isAIPlayer()
        Indicates whether a player is an AI player or not.
        Returns:
        true when player is instance of AIPlayer, otherwise false

      • getGameLogic

        public GameLogic getGameLogic()
        Gets this players tic tac toe game. Returns the tic tac toe game object that this player is associated with.
        Returns:
        this players tic tac toe game

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the player sign. Returns the name of this players player sign enum value.
        Returns:
        name of the player sign enum value of this player

      • getPlayerSign

        public PlayerSign getPlayerSign()
        Gets the player sign. Returns the player sign of this player object. Can not be null.
        Returns:
        player sign object of this player
